text: Banu Zuhrah () is a clan of the Quraish tribe. Akhnas ibn Shariq al-Thaqifi and the Banu Zuhrah were with the Meccan as part of the escort that preceded the battle of Badr, but since he believed the caravan to be safe, he did not join Quraish on their way to a festival in Badr. He together with Banu Zuhrah returned, so this two clans present in the battle writes: ==Notable Members== *Sa`d ibn Abi Waqqas, an early convert to Islam and one of the important companions of the Muhammad.Shi'a Real Ahl al-Sunnah *Aminah bint Wahb, mother of the Islamic prophet Muhammad. *Wahb ibn 'Abd Manaf, grandfather of Muhammad. *Abd-al-Rahman ibn Awf, a companion of the Islamic prophet Muhammad. *Mohammed Ibn Abi Bakr al-Zuhri, a geographer. *Ibn Shihab al-Zuhri, a biographer of the Islamic prophet Muhammad. ==References== Category:Arab groups
title: Banu Zuhrah
